data.job_desc:
Gambaran Pekerjaan:
Melakukan peningkatan penjualan di outlet seperti promosi, program diskon, dsb
Memastikan kebersihan outlet terlaksana dengan baik untuk mencapai tingkat kepuasan customer yang optimal
Mengawasi keluar masuknya uang hasil penjualan sehingga tetap akurat dan terhindar dari kesalahan administrasi
Mengawasi peggunaan biaya operasional outlet agar efektif dan efisien untuk mendukung kelancaran operasional store
Melakukan control inventory/stock sehingga stock antara data di system dan ifsik tetap akurat serta kualitasnya tetap terjaga dengan baik
Mengelola proses operasional outlet sehari-hari baik dari sisi sumber daya manusia maupun system sehingga terlaksana dengan baik sesuai dengan system dan prosedur yang sudah ditetapkan oleh perusahaan.
Kualifikasi:
Usia maksimal 40 tahun
Pendidikan minimal SMA
Minimal 3 tahun pengalaman pada posisi yang sama
Memiliki sisi leadership
Komunikasi yang baik
Mampu menganalisa masalah dengan baik
Memiliki integritas yang tinggi
Siap bekerja shifting
Jenis Pekerjaan: Kontrak
Panjang kontrak: 12 bulan
Gaji: Rp7.000.000 - Rp7.500.000 per bulan

Customer Service Development Program (Aceh)
Pria dan Wanita
Pendidikan D3/S1 semua jurusan
Usia maksimum 25 tahun
Berpenampilan menarik
Memiliki skill service oriented yang tinggi

Agent Konsultan YAIJ adalah seseorang yang bekerja di YAIJ untuk membantu pemuda/i seluruh Indonesia mewujudkan mimpinya untuk studi di Turki dengan memasarkan dan menjual berbagai layanan program yang ada di YAIJ
Kualifikasi Agen Konsultan YAIJ
Berusia 21 thn - 35 tahun
Pendidikan minimal SMA/SMK dan sederajat
Memiliki pengalaman marketing canvassing / lapangan minimal 1 tahun, bukan call center atau sales online
Siap bekerja di bawah tekanan / target
Memiliki strategi marketing / mapping daerah yang jelas
Job description
1. Membantu memasarkan produk dan layanan yang tersedia di Yayasan Aupair Indonesia Jerman.
2. Mengedukasi mengenai program dan layanan yang tersedia di Yayasan Aupair Indonesia Jerman.
3. Aktif menjalin komunikasi dengan calon siswa.
4. Menerima konsultasi program dari calon peserta atau calon siswa .
5. Membantu serta mengarahkan calon siswa yang hendak mendaftar.
Jenis Pekerjaan: Penuh Waktu, Permanen
Gaji: Rp5.000.000 - Rp8.000.000 per bulan
Pengalaman:
Marketing, Sales, Penjual, pedagang: 1 tahun (Diwajibkan)

Hi, Klien kami (Multinational Online Transportation Company) sedang mencari Surveyor/Field Officer!
Kualifikasi:
Pendidikan minimal SMA/sederajat
Memiliki kemampuan untuk melihat dan memperhatikan hal-hal kecil
Terbiasa menggunakan & membaca Maps
Memiliki semangat untuk memenuhi target
Memiliki kendaraan motor
Siap untuk join secepatnya
Job Desc:
Melakukan tugas lapangan (Mapping)
Mendaftarkan POI atau titik koordinat yang belum terinput di maps internal perusahaan
Kontrak: 1 bulan
Gaji: UMK
Job Types: Full-time, Contract
Contract length: 1 month

Responsibilities:
Making sure all the booking converted to check in

Managing and ensuring all owner problems Solved

Maintaining relationships with stakeholders

Working collaboratively with respective functions in order to increase the revenue

Monitoring property revenue and performance

Requirements:
Minimum 1 years of experience in operational fields

Ability to work under pressure

Tech savvy and quick problem solver

Knowledge in maintaining relationships with property owners

Willing to be contracted for 1 year

data.job_name: Supervisor Consumer Engagement - Lhokseumawe Lhokseumawe, Indonesia Commercial
data.job_desc:
Be a part of a revolutionary change

At PMI, we’ve chosen to do something incredible. We’re totally transforming our business and building our future on one clear purpose – to deliver a smoke-free future.

With huge change, comes huge opportunity. So, wherever you join us, you’ll enjoy the freedom to dream up and deliver better, brighter solutions and the space to move your career forward in endlessly different directions.

We are looking for a Supervisor Consumer Engagement who will be based in Lhoksumawe

Your ‘day to day’

Planning, executing, monitoring and reporting overall consumer engagement
activities done through different channels in assigned areas, e.g. Media,
LAMP/HOP, Event, Community
Analyzing marketing issues/opportunities in assigned areas, including
segmenting, consumer profiling, etc.
Managing, implementing, and evaluating territory in line with outlet’s potency and
consumer preference
Managing and implementing strong business relationships with all stakeholders

Who we’re looking for

Having experience working with Media Partners, Advertising Agency, Branding
Team and Creative Agency would be an advantage
Preferably having exposure in field sales distribution with supervisory
experience
Active in organizational activities and social media savvy
Good interpersonal and communication skills
Fast learner and able to work in minimum guidance and supervision
Strong analytical skills and are comfortable dealing with numerical data
Able to operate Computer literacy (Ms. Office) especially Ms. Excel
Willing to work in field and also to be placed in Lhoksumawe
Having a driving license (SIM) type A

What we offer

Our success depends on our talented employees who come to work here every single day with a sense of purpose and an appetite for progress. Join PMI and you too can:

Seize the freedom to define your future and ours. We’ll empower you to take risks, experiment and explore.
Be part of an inclusive, diverse culture, where everyone’s contribution is respected; collaborate with some of the world’s best people and feel like you belong.
Pursue your ambitions and develop your skills with a global business – our staggering size and scale provides endless opportunities to progress.
Take pride in delivering our promise to society: to deliver a smoke-free future

To join our growing team…

Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab:
1. Detailing dan menjual produk alat kesehatan kepada Customer (Rumah Sakit/ Dokter)
2. Melakukan penagihan invoice setelah alat kesehatan berhasil terjual
3. Mengirimkan alat kesehatan kepada Customer apabila dibutuhkan
4. Maintain stock konsinyasi apabila dibutuhkan Customer
Kualifikasi:
1. Pendidikan Min D3
2. Berpengalaman sebagai Marketing Alat Kesehatan/ farmasi selama min 2 tahun
3. Memiliki kendaraan motor dan memiliki SIM C
4. Penempatan di kota Banda Aceh
Jenis Pekerjaan: Penuh Waktu
Gaji: Rp5.000.000 - Rp5.500.000 per bulan

Kaulifikasi :
Pria usia maks. 35 tahun
Pendidikan min. SMK jurusan Otomotif
Pengalaman min. 2 tahun pada bidang yang sama
Memahi tentang Body dan Mesin mobil
Menguasai Ms. Office
Memiliki SIM A aktif
Penempatan : Aceh
Jenis Pekerjaan: Penuh Waktu
Gaji: Rp4.500.000 - Rp5.000.000 per bulan

(22003F3)
Indonesia-Aceh-Banda Aceh | Full-time | Contract | Standard

Role Summary
Monitor and control team performance to ensure accurate sorting and optimum loading of all inbound & outbound shipments and provide the timely lodgment and recovery of the shipments to satisfy the customer needs and requirements within their responsibility

Main Responsibilities
Ensure incoming shipments are recovered, “break bulked”, inspected and cleared in the timely manner
Process material upon receive and make sure material is available for next movement connection
Proceed receipt and lodgment of outbound shipments from country operations within airlines’ cut-off time and RFU
Manage the receipt of data/documents to assist in the preparation of import and export declarations
Arrange physical inspections of shipments by authorities and follow the contingency plan for any emergency or the occasional customer requirement
Monitor performance, training and coach team members in technical knowledge in each zone
Support supervisor in manpower planning and rotation plan to ensure adequate manpower to meet daily operations
Develop a culture of quality, service excellence (for internal customers), flexibility and cost consciousness

Requirement
Bachelor Degree
3 – 5 years experiences in Operations in logistics industry
Leading people

Posting Legal Entity PT. Birotika Semesta

Menjaga account dan memberikan solusi dalam penyelesaian pembayaran angsuran customer.
Pria, Usia maks. 25 th, Pendidikan D3/S1 (SLTA Dipertimbangkan) * Berminat di bidang marketing* Dinamis dan Komunikatif* Menyukai pekerjaan lapangan* Memiliki sepeda motor dan SIM C

data.job_name: Management Trainee Sales Leadership Development Program (Banda Aceh)
data.job_desc:
About the Program
Management trainee is a structured and comprehensive program that provides young graduates with exposure to different functions to accelerate their careers and groom them to become future leaders of the company. As a Management Trainee (Sales Leadership Development Program) you will be given specific training for a certain duration, so you will be able to run projects independently in the several cities.
What We Offer
Fast-track career progression
Accelerated learning environment
Attractive remuneration package
On the job training
Requirements
Bachelor degree with a minimum GPA of 3.00 or its equivalent
Have leadership experience in an organization
Strong communication, organizational, and leadership skills
Skilled at working collaboratively, developing creative solutions, and accomplishing team goals
Can join immediately
Willing to relocate geographically within Indonesia
About the company
Beautyhaul is one of the fastest-growing beauty companies in Indonesia that aspires to be the largest vertically integrated beauty ecosystem from supply to retail. Due to its exponential growth, the company has attracted investment from a reputable investor, Sequoia Capital.
Our first brand ''Somethinc'' was founded in 2019, is currently the #1 skincare brand in e-commerce & modern trade with >1M social media followings. Our second brand Glowinc is breaking the boundaries by offering genderless products at affordable prices. Our offline/online commerce Beautyhaul is the core for carrying multiple brands that we have directly to our customers. We are incubating more and more business models in our platform and aim to be a strong regional player in the beauty, within the South Asia region.
We have a 'CREATE' culture (Collaborative, Responsible, Eccentric, Agile, Tough, Effective). We are looking for more people to join us, who are excited to disrupt the traditional beauty industry with product innovation and non-linear growth, who want to build a profitable start-up into a unicorn company, who will always learn and do the right thing.
Job Type: Full-time
Ability to commute/relocate:
Banda Aceh: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Preferred)
